name: Box Run
description:
Play Box Run and Save Boxia from the evil Red Empire.

Tweet Us: http://twitter.com/PepperDogSoft
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

BOXIA IS IN TROUBLE!!!
FOR A SMALL FEE YOU CAN HELP.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

The evil Red Empire is up to no good, they kidnapped princess Boxia and are now out to kill prince Boxo.

Help guide Boxo in his quest to save his true love, and restore order in the Box galaxy.

Featuring:
* Challenging game play.
* Funny Voice Effects
* Story-Line with cut-scenes
* Local and World-Wide online High-Scores

So don't wait any longer, because without your help Boxia's days are numbered!

WARDROBE MALFUNCTION NOTICE: This game does not contain any Nudity, Boxia and the other boxes do not remove their clothes.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Also try our other games: 3-Hand BlackJack, BlackJack Teacher Pro, Sic Bo, and Num Fight.
